content:
Field Field Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

Represents a field in an index definition in Azure Search, which describes the name, data type, and search behavior of a field. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Create-Index

Edit

In this Article

public class FieldPublic Class Field
Inheritance
ObjectObject
FieldField

Edit

Initializes a new instance of the Field class with required arguments.

public Field(string name, AnalyzerName analyzerName)Public Sub New(name As String, analyzerName As AnalyzerName)
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the field.

analyzerName
AnalyzerName AnalyzerName

The name of the analyzer to use for the field.

Remarks

The new field will automatically be searchable and of type Edm.String.

The data type of the field.

Field(String, DataType, AnalyzerName) Field(String, DataType, AnalyzerName)

Edit

Initializes a new instance of the Field class with required arguments.

public Field(string name, DataType dataType, AnalyzerName analyzerName)Public Sub New(name As String, dataType As DataType, analyzerName As AnalyzerName)
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the field.

dataType
DataType DataType

The data type of the field.

analyzerName
AnalyzerName AnalyzerName

The name of the analyzer to use for the field.

Remarks

The new field will automatically be searchable.

Properties

Analyzer Analyzer

Edit

Gets or sets the name of the analyzer to use for the field at search time and indexing time. This option can be used only with searchable fields and it can't be set together with either SearchAnalyzer or IndexAnalyzer. Once the analyzer is chosen, it cannot be changed for the field. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Language-support 

public AnalyzerName Analyzer { get; set; }Public Property Analyzer As AnalyzerName
Value
AnalyzerName AnalyzerName

IndexAnalyzer IndexAnalyzer

Edit

Gets or sets the name of the analyzer used at indexing time for the field. This option can be used only with searchable fields. It must be set together with SearchAnalyzer and it cannot be set together with the Analyzer option. Once the analyzer is chosen, it cannot be changed for the field. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Language-support 

public AnalyzerName IndexAnalyzer { get; set; }Public Property IndexAnalyzer As AnalyzerName
Value
AnalyzerName AnalyzerName

IsFacetable IsFacetable

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is possible to facet on this field. Not valid for geo-point fields. Default is false.

public bool IsFacetable { get; set; }Public Property IsFacetable As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

IsFilterable IsFilterable

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field can be used in filter expressions. Default is false.

public bool IsFilterable { get; set; }Public Property IsFilterable As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

IsKey IsKey

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field is the key of the index. Valid only for string fields. Every index must have exactly one key field.

public bool IsKey { get; set; }Public Property IsKey As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

IsRetrievable IsRetrievable

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field can be returned in a search result. Default is true.

public bool IsRetrievable { get; set; }Public Property IsRetrievable As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

IsSearchable IsSearchable

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field is included in full-text searches. Valid only forstring or string collection fields. Default is false.

public bool IsSearchable { get; set; }Public Property IsSearchable As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

IsSortable IsSortable

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field can be used in orderby expressions. Not valid for string collection fields. Default is false.

public bool IsSortable { get; set; }Public Property IsSortable As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

Name Name

Edit

Gets or sets the name of the field. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Naming-rules

public string Name { get; set; }Public Property Name As String
Value
String String

SearchAnalyzer SearchAnalyzer

Edit

Gets or sets the name of the analyzer used at search time for the field. This option can be used only with searchable fields. It must be set together with IndexAnalyzer and it cannot be set together with the Analyzer option. This analyzer can be updated on an existing field. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Language-support 

public AnalyzerName SearchAnalyzer { get; set; }Public Property SearchAnalyzer As AnalyzerName
Value
AnalyzerName AnalyzerName

Type Type

Edit

Gets or sets the data type of the field.

public DataType Type { get; set; }Public Property Type As DataType
Value
DataType DataType

Methods

Validate() Validate()

Edit

Validate the object. Throws ValidationException if validation fails.

public virtual void Validate()Public Overridable Sub Validate
